# SlamStats

- The SlamStats app displays women's basketball data sourced from the Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA) and Entertainment and Sports Programming Network (ESPN).

- The data is accessed using the `wehoop` package, part of the `sportsdataverse` suite of packages.

# SlamStats

- The data contains data up to the 2023 season, but also provides access to live matches.

- There's a home page with RSS feed, a ranking page, a team page, a player page, and a live page 🏀.

# SlamStats

A [deployed version](https://hypebright-apps.shinyapps.io/SlamStats) of the app (PWA) is available, which can be installed on your mobile device.
